name: Dave Glover
slogan: IoT Devices to Azure Cloud Services, Makers to Enterprise, we've got you covered.
bio: Dave Glover is a passionate software developer known to dream in code. Interested in new tech wherever it hails from, with particular interests in low powered embedded platforms, communications and cloud systems. I’m a Developer Evangelist in the Developer Experience (DX) Group and have been at Microsoft for over 23 years in the UK and Australia. I work with partners, customers and the community from IoT devices to Azure cloud based solutions, from Makers to Enterprise Solutions.
